document.full_text: united continental holdings inc , the parent of new united airlines , wants a contract with pilots, but any deal must be affordable and fair, its chief executive said on wednesday.
document.title: ual ceo smisek says pilot contract must be fair
lines_and_colors: united continental holdings inc , the parent of new united airlines , wants a contract with pilots, but any deal must be affordable and fair, its chief executive said on wednesday.
